views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10

Birdhouse - replace the "No Notifications" text with the most recent tweet from your desired account instead.

Similar to my earlier tweak Chirp, this uses the Twitter api to display the most recent tweet from a particular feed in place of the boring "No Notifications" text.

Use this tweak to help you stay up to date on news, to learn a language, to monitor a funny bot , it's up to youuuu

updates to come in the future. if you can afford to donate to me that'd be awesome and can be done at paypal.me/andreasott , feel free to give me a follow on Twitter too @candoizo

Configure options from Settings.
